product_name: BIC Sport Natural Surf 2 Surfboard - 7' 9" - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A nimble board for surfers under 185 lbs., the BIC Sport 7 ft. 9 in. Natural Surf 2 Surfboard is also a great introduction to the sport thanks to its stable, longboardlike shape. Foam-injected polyurethane board offers excellent buoyancy and is durable enough to handle a tussle with rocks or barnacles. Consistent 3 in. thickness and longboard shape with minimal tapering at head and tail enhance stability. FCS fin system features 3 removable fins (1 center and 2 side) to aid straight tracking in the water. Closeout.
